review.comment: Super efficient and friendly service - delicious meals easily prepared - awesome delivery personnel - accommodating pickup service as well - would definitely recommend you give it a go!!!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Nina!!! We really appreciate your business!

review.comment: I have been ordering meal prep options from Meals By Chef B and the food is outstanding! The menu for bulk meal prep and individual meals changes weekly and includes a large selection. Sunday delivery is convenient. Their delivery system is exceptional. It provided a narrow window for your delivery time and also let’s you know if you’re the next stop.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much! We are so happy to serve you!!
Thank you!
Thank you!

review.comment: Chef B is fantastic! Great food and customer service. I’ve tried many meal plans and this is by far the best one with the most options. Will definitely keep ordering !!!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Alli! We are grateful for your business!!

review.comment: Their meals are fabulous! They change their meals weekly, and also keep certain standard items, and have a huge variety to pick from! I love their meal prep items, makes it very easy to plan meals for the week. You can pick up or get delivery and they are very flexible. The meals taste great as well and made fresh. Love Meals by Chef B!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Christy!  We are so happy you are happy! Grateful for your business!!

review.comment:
The best meal prep service I’ve ever used. I like to do my own meal prep usually but Chef B’s has become my go to whenever I’m out of town on a weekend and can’t cook.

Also, as someone who’s extremely active and looking to put on size and weight the option to double the portion is huge for me. Too many meal prep services are 15$ for a 250 calorie meal which doesn’t fit my goals. Chef B’s for the win 💪🏼
review.review_reply: Thank you Austin! We are so happy to be a good fit for you! Thank you for your business!
Thank you Kellie! We appreciate hour business!

review.comment: Amazing business and amazing food! The staff is so nice and I love the mom and pop feel when I come to pick up my meals. Not only are the meals delicious, but affordable! I love that there is a rewards program so you are rewarded for your purchases! TRY IT!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Maddie! We are so happy to have your business!!!

review.comment: Amazing food for EVERY DIET or meal plan!!!  I have tried many different meal prep services but they are either limited, repetitive, have no taste or go bad quickly....not Chef B...his food is fabulous, fresh and the ingredients are top notch.  Order - you won't be disappointed, just addicted.
review.review_reply: Thank you Julie! We are so happy you’re pleased! Thank you for your business!

review.comment: My wife left a review yesterday and after the meal I had today at lunch, I just felt compelled to leave my own! I must admit, I was skeptical about ordering a filet and heating it up in the microwave. But, man o man, this was absolutely fantastic! The meat was cooked perfectly (medium to even a little medium rare), very tender, and very tasty! I don't think I could've cooked this filet any better myself! We used another company and the steak I had with them was very dry and over cooked. Not so with Chef B! Oh, and the parmesan cauliflower that came with it was very good as well! I have been very impressed with all of the meals we have had so far. Will definitely continue ordering from them!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Alan! Chef Bryan takes a lot of pride in his meats. We appreciate your taking the time to write this! Our pleasure to serve you!

review.comment: We are so thrilled to have found Meals By Chef B! They offer a broad selection of delicious meals that you can tell are prepared with high quality ingredients by a high quality chef! We couldn't recommend them strongly enough!
review.review_reply: Wow! Thank you so much Laurie! We are equally as thrilled to serve you! Thank you so much for the compliment!

review.comment: Absolutely amazing. I have had the fruit and the bang bang cauliflower already and they were so tasty and so fresh. I gave my dogs some of the fruit and the went nuts when I closed the container. 😂 Will definitely be ordering from here again.
review.review_reply: That’s awesome Madeline! Thank you for your business!

review.comment: This place is amazing! I’ve been struggling to find consistent healthy meals for lunch while at work that also taste great, and meals by chef b solved that issue. I also really  like that they deliver on sundays so my meals are ready to go for the week. The meals are quick and easy to heat up and the weekly specials provide a great variety so lunch doesn’t feel monotonous. I’d highly recommend this place to anyone looking for healthy, tasteful meals at a great price.
review.review_reply: Thank you Eric! We are so happy to be helpful to your week!

review.comment:
No food shopping, no meal prep, no cooking and no clean up. . . The bonus is they don't force you to have a subscription to enjoy Chef prepared meals.

Chef B takes on all the work and at the end of it all you have an amazing well-prepared meal.  You seriously have to try his seafood dishes because his salmon and sea bass are exceptional.  The caper pepper relish on his sea bass will make your taste buds tingle.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your kind words! We appreciate your business!!

review.comment: Bravo Chef B! I have tried many food delivery services and yours is by far the BEST! I'm impressed with not only the quality of the food (fresh and absolutely delicious), but also the selection of KETO/Low Carb friendly meals. It's easy to order and the delivery process is seamless. I also love the family meal and kid-friendly options. Needless to say, I'm hooked! Thank you for a wonderful experience. I can't wait for my next delivery!
review.review_reply: Wow! Thank you so much Summer! This inspires Chef Bryan more than you know! We greatly appreciate your compliment and business!

review.comment: Amazing food week after week.  Great variety for all dietary needs.  Tasty and easy heating.  The whole family loves it.
review.review_reply: Thank you Jeannette! We are so happy everyone loves our food!

review.comment: I’m delighted to have found delicious & healthy meals that fit in with my diet preferences.  Macros are listed on both containers and on the website during the ordering process. Everything was quite flavorful and perfectly prepped/cooked for an easy reheat. Simply incredible.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Anthony! We greatly appreciate your business and compliment!

review.comment: Fantastic! So far I’ve been really impressed with the quality of the food. I’m always skeptical of pre-cooked chicken, and I have to say it’s been fresh and well prepared. Flavors are also great. Sometimes I find the website/portions confusing, but the food itself is really good.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Rachel! We appreciate your business. We are happy to walk you through our portion sizing etc anytime! You can Live chat, text, or call us next time you hop on the website. 561-903-6222

review.comment: The food is fresh and delicious and the ordering process is quick and easy.
review.review_reply: Thank you Veronica!! We greatly appreciate your business!

review.comment: We've been trying a few meal prep companies and decided to try a local one instead of a national one and we're very happy that we did! All of the food was fresh, restaurant quality, and delicious. I love the meal prep options so we don't have to have the same combinations of flavors everyday. We love Chef B!
review.review_reply: Thank you Stephanie! Chef B is all about freshness, quality, and flavor! We are so happy you appreciate it!! Thank you for your business! We hope to serve you often!

review.comment: After feeling burned out from working and keeping our family schedule flowing, we decided to give a meal delivery service a try. Meals by Chef B has not disappointed. We've been very satisfied with the portion sizes, pricing, taste, and variety of food options. I thought we would utilize their service once a month, but we now plan to move to this service full time.
review.review_reply: That’s so awesome to hear! We are grateful for your business. We are so happy to take some stress off your plate for the week! 🤗

review.comment: My wife and I just started with Chef B and we throughly enjoyed our first set of meals. We just ordered our second week and look forward to seeing what goodies we receive this week.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for giving us the opportunity to serve you and your wife meals! We are grateful for your business!

review.comment: We have a 6 month old, which means our dinners start around 9pm. Thanks to Chef B we eat delicious meals as a family before our daughters bedtime every night! Highly recommend!
review.review_reply: We love that we make life easier and delicious all in one for you!! Thank you so much for your business!

review.comment: I don’t live in Florida and wanted to have quality meals delivered to a friend in S. FL who’d just lost a family member. I was impressed with the variety on Chef B’s menu, and the ease of ordering the delivery. My friend was thrilled with the meals quality. We both highly recommend Chef B’s! I will definitely use them again.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for entrusting us to deliver food to your friend during such a sensitive time. We greatly appreciate your business! Hoping we can serve you if you are in town one day:)

review.comment: We made our first order with Chef B and are very happy. The food was delicious. Communication with the company is great and the food is packaged well and labeled. Everyone in the family was happy with their choices!
review.review_reply: So happy to hear this! Thank you so much for allowing us to serve you and your family!

review.comment: Hands down, the BEST meal prep company!! My fiancé and I have been on the search for the perfect meal prep company for a year. We have tried many and then we found Meals By Chef B and we immediately stopped ordering from anyone else. These are by far the best flavor, portion and selection!! We are 100% LOYAL and I tell everyone about them!!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much! This is awesome! We are grateful you found us!!

review.comment: Meals by Chef B is the best find.  I am so happy to have found a place that offers chef prepared meals that allows me to eat healthy.  The meals are quality ingredients, perfectly prepared, and plated beautifully.  I have tried several dishes and each one is restaurant quality.  It has changed my life!!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much! We love changing lives! We appreciate your business!

review.comment: I was introduced to Meals by Chef B from my local gym and I must say I am so happy I was!  I have not been disappointed once by any of the meals I have received.  The food is fresh, delicious and there is a new list of specials each week that are always amazing.  The variety of options is a huge plus for my family.  This is by far the best company I have purchased pre-made meals from.
review.review_reply: Thank you Jen for giving us a shot! We are honored to serve you and your family and appreciate your business!

review.comment: The meals that Chef B and Staff provide have helped me significantly!! As a full time physician working in these conditions the last thing I had time was cooking healthy meals. Time was not on my side. Now.. my family of four looks forward to dinner. Delicious and healthy AND affordable!!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Anita! This means a lot to us to hear that we are making life easier and more delicious! We appreciate your weekly business as much as you appreciate us!

review.comment: Chef B makes life a lot easier! Food is fresh and healthy!
review.review_reply: Thank you Debbie! We are so happy you are enjoying everything!

review.comment: Hands down the best-tasting meal delivery service we’ve ever had, and we’ve had A. LOT. The flavors were magnificent; the quality was perfection, and the meal choices?! *chef’s kiss* Thank you for being such a fantastic customer-friendly business - looking forward to Sunday already :)
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Tori!  This means so much to Chef Bryan!

review.comment:
Can I give 10 stars??

I was recommended the meal service by Chef B my colleagues who have an had excellent experience with them.

My husband and I have been ordering from them for 3 weeks now and it makes our lives so much easier. We have loved pretty much every meal.

We love to cook but just lack the time and energy, and with the pandemic we try not to go to the grocery stores as often so we can't always have fresh produce to cook with. We ended up eating out at restaurants multiple meals a day and spending a ton of money. We started ordering from Chef B's. They offer large portions and most meals are pretty healthy (even if we have a semi-unhealthy meal, it's still better than what we were eating before!). We have ordered breakfast, snacks and dinner. We like the dinners the most, and I order some lunch portions for lunch or sometimes order dinner to split into lunch and dinner because they are so big.

Delivery occurs Sundays, usually first thing in the morning for us. We haven't had an issue with any order so far.

Thank you so much Chef B for making our lives so much easier!
review.review_reply: Awww thank you so much! We are happy you are happy!

review.comment: I absolutley love everything we have tried by the chef and have even turned a couple friends on to it. I have been doing keto on and off for years and the preparation is what always makes me give up. I'm the worst!  Getting delicious keto meals by Chef B makes it so much easier to follow my nutrition goals and stay on track! My 4 year old also loves the kids meals too. I'm so thankful I found Chef B!
review.review_reply: Thank you Melinda!!! We are so happy to make life easier and more tasteful!!!! We appreciate your ongoing business!

review.comment: I am at a place where I really don’t have time ( or energy ☺️) to cook meals. I’ve been looking around for a about a year for a place that could relieve me of this responsibility and finally came across Meals By Chef B. The food is delicious! There are so many choices!! They deliver to my house and they are exceptionally nice! I’m picky and I could not recommend them more.
review.review_reply: Yay! We are always thrilled when we make lives easier and you enjoy our service! Thank you so much for your business!

review.comment: The meals are delicious! The Chef is creative and there are new items on the menu every week. Our favorites are the Angus Steak Sliders, the Meat Loaf and the Pork with Garlic butter.
review.review_reply: Thank you Louise! We truly appreciate your business!

review.comment: I found Chef B almost a month ago and it has been a game changer. I have tried a few meal prep services and none compare. The food is so flavorful and perfect portions. I am using Chef B to lose the baby weight and, along with exercising daily, I am down almost 13 pounds!! I am so happy I found Meals by Chef B
review.review_reply: Thank you!! We greatly appreciate your weekly business!!

review.comment: We’ve ordered for a few weeks now and have absolutely loved every single thing! Plus it makes my life that much easier!! Huge fan 😊
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Bari! We are all about making lives easier with good food!

review.comment:
We are so busy working, we have very little time to cook .  We have been ordering these meals for quite some time.!!! Absolutely delicious!!!
Last week we ordered the Chefs Pad Thai.... It was the best pad Thai I have ever had in my life!!!   Love you guys so much!! Special shout out to my delivery person Debbie!!  Always has a smile on her face !!! What a delight!!
review.review_reply: So happy to hear we are able to make your week easier!! Thank you so much for your business! 🙏🏼
Thank you Fawn!

review.comment: Chef B has truly enhanced our lives.  Both of us working and neither one feels like cooking.  Which meant, calling out for fast food and you know what happens!  We are now eating fresh, flavorful (the sauces are so so good) dinners.  My husband's blood sugar (he's a diabetic) has stabilized to a consistent number and I've lost just about 15 lbs.  All meals show the nutritional label which makes smart choices so easy.  But there is the macaroni and cheese that I would love to try....maybe after another 10 lbs, I'll go for it.  I cannot say enough good things about this new find.  We've been ordering 6 meals a week for about 10 weeks now.  And another thing, we look so forward to see what is new on the menu each week.  They have taken care of ease, flavor, nutrition and variety and I know there is much more.  We love Chef B's!!
review.review_reply: Hi Linda! Thank you so much for this review. We LOVE when we positively impact lives. It makes this all worth it! We truly appreciate you and your husbands business! I’m so happy he’s feeling well and you are losing the weight you wanted!!! Thank you!!

review.comment: Always delish food and the best customer support!
review.review_reply: Thank you! We appreciate your business!

review.comment: Best pre cooked food delivery service out there! I've tried other services in the past, but ChefB beats them all. They are a little more pricey then their competitors but definitely worth it for the quality, flavor and portion of the food. They list their Macros on their food/website, which is great when trying to count Macros, and their portion size fits the description... when they say you get 8oz of steak... you get 8oz of steak (I weighed it myself). I typically get 2 Dinner portions for an entire day of eating, and my girlfriend can make 1 dinner portion last 2-3 days. Another great thing is that they change their menu every week with many options to choose from.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much!!! We are so happy you and your girlfriend are enjoying it and appreciate the value we offer! Thank you for taking the time to write this! 🙏🏼

review.comment: It’s very difficult to find a home chef who knows what special tastes everyone likes. Bryan had me figured out just by talking to me. Perfect meals the way I like it. Good size portions, fresh, delivered in a timely fashion. Why do I need to wait in a restaurant and get  served by someone who doesn’t know me? I do not like waiting to get seated especially during snowbird season where the wait can be almost an hour. Chef B meals change by the week and the way he adds his special touch is unreal. After workouts and a shower I go to the refrigerator and get my gourmet healthy meal.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much! We are so happy to solve a problem for you!

review.comment:
Meals by Chef B, recently prepared the most amazing hors-d’oeuvres for our beautiful wedding. The comments from our guests were all outstanding! We had a mixture of seafood, chicken, beef and veggies that were seasoned unbelievably! The fruit to go with our cake table was the freshest ever!  No one went home hungry!
We can’t wait to use Chef B for our next gathering, and be amazed by his incredible talent of taste and presentation. Thanks again Chef B, and to your amazing friendly staff!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Betz! It was truly our pleasure to serve you and your guests! What a beautiful day!

review.comment: Absolutely amazing and fresh food! The BEST food home delivery service in PBC!
review.review_reply: Thank you!! We are so excited to have you!!

review.comment: Get ready to be amazed!!!!The food came fast, fresh, and flavorful! I ordered the keto meals and desserts. It was really hard to find a company that offered keto meals without added sugar and preservatives in my area but I was lucky enough to find this company on google. It has been like having my very own personalized chef in my kitchen! The meals are priced fair for the food quality and gourmet options. Not to mention the customer service has been excellent as well.  I would highly recommend to friends, family, and anyone looking  for help to improve their eating habits :)
review.review_reply: Wow! Thank you Christine! We are thrilled we impacted you like this. Thank you so much for giving us a shot! We are excited to serve you! Welcome to our Chef B family!

review.comment:
We have tried a few other meal delivery services in the past and we have never found one we can order consistently and be happy with. Then we found Chef B!

We are 'foodies' and we are so impressed with the quality, variety and flavors each week. Not only is it convenient but we truly look forward to our meals. The delivery service is consistent and reliable. I would highly recommended Meals by Chef B!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Jennifer! We appreciate your business just as much! Thank you for your ongoing support!!

review.comment: Meals by Chef B is a great place to get your meals. We have been using them for the last four months. The food is delicious, the presentation is appetizing and the service is great. They go out of their way to remember your allergies, your preferences and anything that will make your dinners special.  There are many choices for meals and the specials are really special. We are so grateful that our daughter recommended them to us. The last four months have provided us with great dinners perfectly prepared.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much! We are honored to serve you! We are so grateful for your weekly business!
